verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's demand that [ARG0: China] [V: cut] [ARG1: its trade deficit with the U.S.] [ARGM-MNR: by $ 200 billion] [ARGM-TMP: in two years] is tall order politically . It also defies the laws of economics .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump 's demand that China cut its trade deficit with the U.S. by $ 200 billion in two years] [V: is] [ARG2: tall order] [ARGM-MNR: politically] . It also defies the laws of economics .
